originalText.text: Green room nyc is the best! I have been getting my hair cut and styled by Taka since 2015 and it is always a great experience. Green room is a lovely, chic studio and the artists take time to pick the right look for you!

text.text: Green room nyc is the best! I have been getting my hair cut and styled by Taka since 2015 and it is always a great experience. Green room is a lovely, chic studio and the artists take time to pick the right look for you!

originalText.text: Mai is so incredible! She did my sister's hair and mine, and explained so much to me about what kind of hairstyle would suit my face shape, my hair texture, etc. She brought the wave back into my hair. She was also so quick, so kind, and such a laid back conversationalist. Might move to LES just so I can have my hair done by Mai! Green room is a (not so hidden) gem.

text.text: Mai is so incredible! She was also so quick, so kind, and such a laid back conversationalist. Might move to LES just so I can have my hair done by Mai! Green room is a (not so hidden) gem.

originalText.text: Yuki's haircut begins with a thorough consultation, addressing any concerns and deciding on the desired style. The shampoo experience is delightful, focusing on pressure points. Yuki is an experienced hairstylist. I recommend her to everyone.

text.text: Yuki's haircut begins with a thorough consultation, addressing any concerns and deciding on the desired style. The shampoo experience is delightful, focusing on pressure points. Yuki is an experienced hairstylist. I recommend her to everyone.

originalText.text: The Green Room is by far the best place that I have gotten my hair done, definitely in New York (and really I think ever!). It is the only place that I have felt like I always feel good about going back-I have been coming here for four years now. I get my hair cut and colored by Taka, who is the owner. He listens so attentively to my preferences and gives me suggestions knowing my routine, time to do my hair in the morning, etc. I have never had someone take such care when they do my hair-he is so detailed and careful. I have never been disappointed with my hair cut or color and Iâ€™ve never felt like it was the type of hair cut or color that only looked good the first day or when it was styled in the salon. The staff in general is exceptionally kind-they always give me a blanket when I am getting my hair washed! They are just very detailed, considerate and truly kind. I recommend the Green Room to anyone who is looking to get their hair done and is new to NYC or wants to find a place they can stick with. Prior to Green Room I felt like I was just hopping around from place to place and always ended up going into a hair cut a little anxious about how it would go. I would rather wait weeks to get my hair done here than go anywhere else!
